cause.description:
This Human Rights Union is designed to enforce the billed law, statute laws and legislations that are setup in different countries and states around the world.
We help those in need of Employment relations, Gender sexuality rights, Humanity rights and protection rights for citizens wanting advise and/or help.
Wheither your not in Employment trouble. The Human Rights Union is with you all the way and have Legal powers setup to help you and others.
1. Enforce Law and maintain country/state Order
2. Help citizens that are needing Legal Advise
3. Support citizens in any Legal capacity in a Court of Law
4. Working together with other Human Rights and Unions
5. Represent on behalf of our clients and visitors in this Human Rights Union
6. Bring Justice and Fair settlements to defendants and our clients with this Human Rights Union
cause.mission: Enforce the Law and Order of different countries and states and on behalf of the civilians. Working together with other Human Rights and Unions.
cause.name: Human Rights Union
